title: Sword Health
description:
Meet Sword Health: The world’s first platform to predict, prevent and treat pain.

Struggling with discomfort or pain? Sword Health connects you with expert clinical care and easy-to-use tech from home. Get relief, improve physical function, address bladder leakage, eliminate pain. From low back pain to pelvic health, every program we offer delivers care that's:
• CONVENIENT: Do it from the comfort of your home. No travel time, no waiting rooms.
• EFFECTIVE: Powerful technology and a personal connection leads to life-changing recovery.
• NO COST: Zero out-of-pocket costs, no co-pays.

ABOUT THE SWORD PLATFORM
• THRIVE: Personalized digital physical therapy from the comfort of home 
• BLOOM: Next generation of women’s pelvic health care
• MOVE: The first clinical-led solution designed to help build sustainable activity habits (with support for Wear OS)
• ON-CALL: 24/7 access to care from Clinical Pain Specialists.
• ACADEMY: The highest quality physical health education and resources 
• PREDICT: The first AI engine built to detect and avoid costs of unnecessary procedures and surgeries

WHY SWORD?
• Members only work with Doctors of Physical Therapy, 100% of the time
• Unparalleled commitment to clinical integrity
• Only solution with FDA-listed devices 
• More regulatory clearances than any other company in digital health

ABOUT SWORD HEALTH
Sword is the world’s first platform to predict, prevent, and treat pain by starting with the expertise of world-class doctors of physical therapy and then building an interactive AI experience to deliver care that members can use anywhere, anytime, under a clinician’s supervision. Delivering over 2 million AI sessions to members and available to over 10,000 employers across three continents, Sword is redefining healthcare by saving clients millions while delivering unparalleled recovery from pain to its members. Visit www.SwordHealth.com for more information.

Move integrates with Health Kit to track activity and step goals.

Keywords: Sword Health app, Sword Health physical therapy app, Sword Health PT, Digital physical therapy, Digital PT, Virtual physical therapy, Physical therapy, Back pain relief, Musculoskeletal injury treatment, MSK pain relief exercises, Joint pain relief, AI Healthcare, AI Care, Digital pelvic health therapy, Women’s health
